verses.verse: And he <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> by the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G3844>side:<s%> and there was <S%G4863>gathered<s%> to him a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that he <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and <S%G2521>sat<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was by the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1095>land.<s%>
And he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G4183>many<s%> things by <S%G3850>parables,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them in his <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%>
<S%G191>Listen;<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> there <S%G1831>went<s%> out a <S%G4687>sower<s%> to sow: <S%G4687><s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as he <S%G4687>sowed,<s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3844>side,<s%> and the <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2719>devoured<s%> it up.

And <S%G243>some<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4075>stony<s%> ground, <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G2192>had<s%> not <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> it <S%G1816>sprang<s%> up, <S%G1223>because<s%> it <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G899>depth<s%> of earth: <S%G1093><s%>
But when the <S%G2246>sun<s%> was up, it was <S%G2739>scorched;<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> it <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4491>root,<s%> it <S%G3583>withered<s%> away.

And <S%G243>some<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G173>thorns,<s%> and the <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G305>grew<s%> up, and <S%G4846>choked<s%> it, and it <S%G1325>yielded<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

And <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>ground,<s%> and did <S%G1325>yield<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> that <S%G305>sprang<s%> up and <S%G837>increased;<s%> and <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G5342>forth,<s%> <S%G1520>some<s%> <S%G5144>thirty,<s%> and <S%G1520>some<s%> <S%G1835>sixty,<s%> and <S%G1520>some<s%> an hundred. <S%G1540><s%>
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, He that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>
And <S%G3753>when<s%> he was <S%G2651>alone,<s%> they that were <S%G4012>about<s%> him with the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> of him the <S%G3850>parable.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, To you it is <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> but to them that are <S%G1854>without,<s%> all <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588>these<s%> things are <S%G1096>done<s%> in parables: <S%G3850><s%>

That <S%G991>seeing<s%> they may <S%G991>see,<s%> and not <S%G1492>perceive;<s%> and <S%G191>hearing<s%> they may <S%G191>hear,<s%> and not <S%G4920>understand;<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G3379>at<s%> <S%G3379>any<s%> <S%G3379>time<s%> they should be <S%G1994>converted,<s%> and their <S%G265>sins<s%> should be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> them.
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1492>Know<s%> you not <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable?<s%> and <S%G4459>how<s%> then will you <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> parables? <S%G3850><s%>
The <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G4687>sows<s%> the word. <S%G3056><s%>

And <S%G3778>these<s%> are they by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3844>side,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> is <S%G4687>sown;<s%> but <S%G3752>when<s%> they have <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G2112>immediately,<s%> and <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> that was <S%G4687>sown<s%> in their hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

And <S%G3778>these<s%> are they <S%G3668>likewise<s%> which are <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4075>stony<s%> ground; <S%G3739>who,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they have <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> it with gladness; <S%G5479><s%>

And <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4491>root<s%> in <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> and so <S%G2076>endure<s%> but for a <S%G4340>time:<s%> <S%G1534>afterward,<s%> when <S%G2347>affliction<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1375>persecution<s%> <S%G1096>rises<s%> for the <S%G3056>word's<s%> sake, <S%G2112>immediately<s%> they are offended. <S%G4624><s%>
And <S%G3778>these<s%> are they which are <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G173>thorns;<s%> <S%G3778>such<s%> as <S%G191>hear<s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%>

And the <S%G3308>cares<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> and the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G4149>riches,<s%> and the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G3062>other<s%> things <S%G1531>entering<s%> in, <S%G4846>choke<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and it <S%G1096>becomes<s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

And <S%G3778>these<s%> are they which are <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>ground;<s%> <S%G3748>such<s%> as <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and receive <S%G3858><s%> it, and <S%G2592>bring<s%> <S%G2592>forth<s%> <S%G2592>fruit,<s%> <S%G1520>some<s%> thirty <S%G5144>times,<s%> <S%G1520>some<s%> <S%G1835>sixty,<s%> and <S%G1520>some<s%> an hundred. <S%G1540><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Is a <S%G3088>candle<s%> <S%G2064>brought<s%> to be <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G3426>bushel,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G2825>bed?<s%> and not to be <S%G2007>set<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a candlestick? <S%G3087><s%>

For there is nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2927>hid,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall not be <S%G5319>manifested;<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> was <S%G5100>any<s%> thing <S%G1096>kept<s%> <S%G614>secret,<s%> but that it should <S%G2064>come<s%> abroad. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5318><s%>
If <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Take <S%G991>heed<s%> what you <S%G191>hear:<s%> with <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3358>measure<s%> you <S%G3354>mete,<s%> it shall be <S%G3354>measured<s%> to you: and to you that <S%G191>hear<s%> shall <S%G4369>more<s%> be given. <S%G4369><s%>
For he that <S%G2192>has,<s%> to him shall be <S%G1325>given:<s%> and he that <S%G2192>has<s%> not, from him shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> he has. <S%G2192><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3779>So<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> as <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> should <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4703>seed<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the ground; <S%G1093><s%>

And should <S%G2518>sleep,<s%> and <S%G1453>rise<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day,<s%> and the <S%G4703>seed<s%> should <S%G985>spring<s%> and <S%G3373>grow<s%> up, he <S%G1492>knows<s%> not how. <S%G5613><s%>

For the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2592>brings<s%> <S%G2592>forth<s%> <S%G2592>fruit<s%> of <S%G844>herself;<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> the <S%G5528>blade,<s%> <S%G1534>then<s%> the <S%G4719>ear,<s%> <S%G1534>after<s%> that the <S%G4134>full<s%> <S%G4621>corn<s%> in the ear. <S%G4719><s%>

But when the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is <S%G3860>brought<s%> <S%G3860>forth,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> he <S%G649>puts<s%> in the <S%G1407>sickle,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> is come. <S%G3936><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Whereunto<s%> shall we <S%G3666>liken<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> with <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G3850>comparison<s%> shall we <S%G3846>compare<s%> it?

It is <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2848>grain<s%> of <S%G4615>mustard<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G3739>which,<s%> when it is <S%G4687>sown<s%> in the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> is <S%G3398>less<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4690>seeds<s%> that be in the earth: <S%G1093><s%>

But when it is <S%G4687>sown,<s%> it <S%G305>grows<s%> up, and <S%G1096>becomes<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3001>herbs,<s%> and <S%G4160>shoots<s%> out <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2798>branches;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G2681>lodge<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of it.
And with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3850>parables<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> he the <S%G3056>word<s%> to them, as they were <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> it.

But <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> he not to them: and when they were <S%G2596>alone,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> he <S%G1956>expounded<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to his <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> when the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Let us <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1330>over<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> side. <S%G4008><s%>

And when they had <S%G863>sent<s%> <S%G863>away<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> they <S%G3880>took<s%> him even as he was in the <S%G4143>ship.<s%> And there were also with him <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4142>little<s%> <S%G4142>ships.<s%>

And there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2978>storm<s%> of <S%G417>wind,<s%> and the <S%G2949>waves<s%> <S%G1911>beat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that it was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1072>full.<s%>

And he was in the <S%G4403>hinder<s%> part of the ship, <S%G2518>asleep<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G4344>pillow:<s%> and they <S%G1326>awake<s%> him, and <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G3199>care<s%> you not that we <S%G622>perish?<s%>

And he <S%G1326>arose,<s%> and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G417>wind,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G4623>Peace,<s%> be still. <S%G5392><s%> And the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>ceased,<s%> and there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1055>calm.<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> are you <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1169>fearful?<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> is it that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> faith? <S%G4102><s%>

And they <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G5401><s%> <S%G5401>exceedingly,<s%> <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G686><s%> <S%G686>manner<s%> of man is <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> him?
